description: This file declares an interface class 'IEventHandler' with four pure virtual methods for handling various OCI container events, designed for implementing event handling within a plugin system for WPEFramework.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class defining callback methods for OCI container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Handles event when an OCI container starts, receives the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Handles event when an OCI container stops, receives the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Handles event when an OCI container fails, receives the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Handles event when the state of an OCI container changes, receives the container name and event data.
